name: Kinocorium
description:
Kinocorium is a flowy mobile arcade game where you help mycelium grow new mushrooms to build your own kinocorium (mushroom terrarium).

Our submission for the 2023 Global Game Jam.

Contributions:

  • Arne Bongers - Programming
  • Bas Stafhorst - Design and Programming
  • Mathijs Pont - Programming and Audio
  • Tessa Laurijssens - Programming and Art
  • Laura de Looff - Art and Pizza
